data.name: Meet Cute: Beach üêæ
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist our new game:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928840/My_Dragon_Party/


About the Game

Wishlist our new game My Furry Dragon:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818370/My_Furry_Dragon/

It's the hottest time of the year, and it's the best time for our main character to relax from his photographer job. However, as he walks along the beach, a ball suddenly hits his head and he falls unconscious. Gladly, it doesn't hurt him, and most importantly - he meets Lucy, a hot girl who works at his resort.

Meet Cute: Beach is a short kinetic novel about a small holiday romance. Relax, enjoy and spend time together with Lucy!

FEATURES:


‚Ä¢ Fascinating meet cute story.
‚Ä¢ HD fully original artworks.
‚Ä¢ ‚âà30 minutes of content.
‚Ä¢ Relaxing atmosphere.
‚Ä¢ Hot girl!

data.short_description: Is where anything better than summer vacation? Yes! A summer vacation with a hot girl! Grab your sunscreen, sunglasses, and get ready to have fun with her.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
